decks.notes: The main idea behind this deck is to use Doomsday to set up a winning combo with Thassa's Oracle. By using various cantrips and tutors to manipulate your library, you aim to stack your deck in such a way that Thassa's Oracle will win you the game when it enters the battlefield. The inclusion of cards like Street Wraith, Lotus Petal, and Lion's Eye Diamond help to generate mana and dig deeper into your deck to find the pieces you need to assemble your combo. This deck focuses on quick and efficient gameplay to secure a win as early as possible.

The deck aims to assemble a powerful board state using Mystic Forge in combination with artifacts like Grim Monolith and Urza's Saga. By generating mana and manipulating artifacts with cards like Voltaic Key and Candelabra of Tawnos, the deck can generate a huge advantage and control the game. With access to powerful planeswalkers like Karn, the Great Creator and Tezzeret, Cruel Captain, as well as disruption tools like Pithing Needle and Tormod's Crypt, the deck can disrupt opponents while executing its own powerful combo strategy.

The deck focuses on utilizing powerful graveyard recursion spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead to quickly bring back high-impact creatures such as Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier. This combo-heavy strategy is supported by a suite of disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect the combo pieces and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces while controlling the board with counterspells and disruption, ultimately overwhelming the opponent with powerful threats and game-ending combos.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by using counterspells, removal spells, and card draw to disrupt the opponent's strategy. It aims to stabilize the board with cards like Wrath of the Skies and Solitude while generating card advantage with Brainstorm and Ponder. The deck also includes cards like Leyline Binding and Ground Seal to deal with specific threats and prevent graveyard shenanigans. The overall strategy is to assert dominance over the game through efficient control and resource management, eventually out-valuing the opponent and securing victory.

This deck focuses on using creature threats and disruption to apply pressure to the opponent quickly. By using cards like Thoughtseize and Swords to Plowshares to control the opponent's resources and Green Sun's Zenith to find key creatures, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent early on. The inclusion of mana dorks like Noble Hierarch and Ignoble Hierarch helps accelerate the deck's mana production, allowing for powerful plays with cards like Knight of the Reliquary and Frenzied Baloth. The deck also utilizes lands like Wasteland and Karakas to disrupt the opponent's mana base and protect its own creatures.

This deck revolves around assembling a powerful combo involving Mystic Forge and various artifacts to generate mana, draw cards, and control the board. The goal is to use Mystic Forge to cast spells from the top of the library, utilizing key cards like Tezzeret, Grim Monolith, and Urza's Saga to create a strong advantage. By combining artifact synergy with efficient mana generation, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and win through a combination of card advantage and board presence.

The deck focuses on quickly assembling a combo involving Nadu, Winged Wisdom and Nomads en-Kor to draw through the deck and generate mana with Gaea's Cradle. It also includes protection and disruption elements such as Endurance, Allosaurus Shepherd, and Collector Ouphe to hinder opponents' strategies. The deck utilizes tutors like Chord of Calling and Green Sun's Zenith to find key pieces and maintain consistency. Overall, the strategy prioritizes assembling the combo quickly and efficiently while disrupting the opponent's game plan.

The deck focuses on using various artifacts and mana ramp to quickly assemble a combo involving Mystic Forge, allowing the player to cast spells from the top of their library. The deck also includes support cards like Tezzeret and Karn to facilitate the combo and disrupt the opponent's strategy. By efficiently generating mana and manipulating the top of the library, the deck aims to overpower the opponent with powerful spells and combo pieces, ultimately leading to victory through a synergistic and strategic approach.

The deck focuses on utilizing Mystic Forge to generate card advantage and cast multiple spells in a single turn. The deck includes cards that can untap artifacts (such as Voltaic Key and Manifold Key) to fuel the combo, as well as powerful artifacts like The One Ring and Ugin, Eye of the Storms to dominate the board. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Pithing Needle and Tormod's Crypt to disrupt opponent strategies. Overall, the deck aims to quickly assemble a dominant board state and overwhelm opponents with its powerful artifact synergies.

This deck relies on utilizing Goblin Engineer and Goblin Welder to bring Painter's Servant into play in order to combo off with Grindstone and mill the opponent's library. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Ensnaring Bridge, Blood Moon, and Karn, the Great Creator to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo while maintaining control over the game through its disruptive elements and powerful threats.

The deck aims to quickly and efficiently get out big creatures such as Emrakul, the Aeons Torn using the combo of Show and Tell or Sneak Attack. Protection is provided with cards like Force of Will and Veil of Summer, while cantrips like Brainstorm and Ponder help with card selection and drawing into combo pieces. The deck also includes cards like Stock Up to help find combo pieces. The mana base is built to support the fast and explosive nature of the deck, with lands like Ancient Tomb and City of Traitors providing additional ramp.

The deck focuses on generating a large amount of mana and drawing through the deck quickly to find key combo pieces like Tendrils of Agony or Galvanic Relay. It utilizes efficient spells like Dark Ritual and Lotus Petal to accelerate its game plan, while also disrupting the opponent with cards like Thoughtseize and Veil of Summer. The deck aims to cast multiple spells in a turn to build up storm count and finish the game with a powerful storm spell or combo. The mana base is designed to support the deck's color requirements and provide consistency in casting its spells.

The deck focuses on using powerful mana acceleration cards such as Lion's Eye Diamond and Lotus Petal to quickly generate mana and cast a large number of spells in a single turn. This leads to building a storm count for Tendrils of Agony or Galvanic Relay to finish off the opponent. The deck also includes ways to refill the hand with Echo of Eons and Gaea's Will, as well as protection spells like Veil of Summer. The goal is to create a massive storm turn and overwhelm the opponent with a lethal amount of spells in one go.

This deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Thoughtseize, then utilizing Reanimate to bring them back onto the battlefield for a devastating combo play. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Force of Will and Daze to protect its strategy and control the game. With a mix of versatile creatures like Murktide Regent and Archon of Cruelty, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a powerful board presence and win the game before they can respond effectively.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly fill your graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Thoughtseize, and then bring them back onto the battlefield using Reanimate and Animate Dead. The deck also includes disruptive cards like Force of Will and Daze to protect your combo pieces and control the game. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student can also help to dig for combo pieces, while Murktide Regent and Archon of Cruelty provide additional threats. Overall, this deck aims to win the game by reanimating game-ending creatures and overwhelming your opponent.
